title: The Human Race to the Future
description:
The Human Race to the Future: What Could Happen - and What to Do
by Daniel Berleant (Author)

Publication Date: April 28, 2013
Who doesn't wonder about the future... what things will be like some day, how long it might take, and what we can do about it?

This book, meaty yet readable and occasionally humorous, will make you think. It spans from the current century to nearly eternity. Imaginative yet scientifically plausible, most chapters offer a concluding section discussing actions to take in view of the predicted future scenarios. Some of these actions can be done by individuals, others by nations or other groups, and still others by the entire world.
